ygData.subject: RE: Re: patch changes
ygData.msgSnippet: It s up to you if you want to research it, i think you can even buy it if you want.┬á With the new changes made to shadow vortex, it siphons some ac from your
ygData.messageBody:
It's up to you if you want to research it, i think you can even buy it if
you want.∩┐╜ With the new changes made to shadow vortex, it siphons some ac
from your target (not sure how much) and give me somewhere around 16 to 18
AC more (don't remember the exact number @ level 35).∩┐╜ I used it this
weekend in sola and it wasn't that bad since i sometimes have to take a
beating in there to make sure my pet stays alive, so the extra ac is a nice
bonus.
∩┐╜
Vanelin Blackheart
lvl 35 de nec - Povar
